examples.example: 周末我常和家人一起去公园享受美好的户外时光。

translate.english: On weekends, I often go to the park with my family to enjoy the wonderful outdoor time.

examples.example: 风和日丽的日子，我们一家人开开心心地在公园散步。

translate.english: On a sunny and breezy day, our whole family happily takes a walk in the park.

examples.example: 风和日丽的一天，我愉快地在公园里欣赏着美丽的风景。

translate.english: On a sunny and breezy day, I happily enjoyed the beautiful scenery in the park.
